name: Kinyel Druu'giir
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages, Elvish

trait.name: Assassinate
text: During its first turn, Kinyel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Kinyel scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
text: If Kinyel is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Kinyel instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
text: Kinyel deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Kinyel that isn't incapacitated and Kinyel doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Kinyel to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, Kinyel has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: <$title_short_name$>'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). <$title_short_name$> can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 134
